Veronika Kovalenko

Content Manager

With 10 years of experience in journalism, Veronika has published more 600 articles and is fluent in English, German, and Chinese. She specializes in digital media, content strategy, and international news, delivering in-depth, insightful, and objective analysis.

Her expertise also extends to media trends, audience engagement, and the evolving landscape of global communications.
